ANDRES ZABALETA

FRONTEND DEVELOPER

ABOUT ME

I am an Argentinian, 25 years old, Frontend React Developer

With background as Certified Master Builder specialized in technical/civil drawing and 3D modeling. Working as manager at home installations and as a self-taught freelance Graphic Designer.

Starting in web development, Studing at platforms like Platzi and UTN - Buenos Aires. Currently Training for become a fullstack developer.
